actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: To provide for a competition to select the architectural plans for a museum to be built on the East Saint Louis portion of the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial, and for other purposes.
short_title: East Saint Louis Jefferson National Expansion Memorial Architectural Design Competition Act

summary.text: East Saint Louis Jefferson National Expansion Memorial Architectural Design Competition Act - Establishes a commission to: (1) conduct an architectural competition to solicit design proposals for a museum to be built on the East Saint Louis portion of the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial; and (2) study and report to the President and the Congress on possible funding mechanisms for the development, construction, and maintenance of the museum. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: East Saint Louis Jefferson National Expansion Memorial Architectural Design Competition Act
To provide for a competition to select the architectural plans for a museum to be built on the East Saint Louis portion of the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial, and for other purposes.
